00023 class CPSActiveForm extends CActiveForm
00024 {
00025     //********************************************************************************
00026     //* Member Variables
00027     //********************************************************************************
00028 
00029     protected $_rowFormat = '{label}{field}';
00030 
00031     public $wide = false;
00032     public $fields = array();
00033 
00037     protected $_formModel = null;
00038     public function getFormModel() { return $this->_formModel; }
00039     public function setFormModel( $value ) { $this->_formModel = $value; }
00040 
00041     //********************************************************************************
00042     //* Public Methods
00043     //********************************************************************************

00048     public function run()
00049     {
00050         $this->_buildForm();
00051         return parent::run();
00052     }
00053 
00054     //********************************************************************************
00055     //* Private Methods

00062     protected function _buildForm()
00063     {
00064         $_fieldList = $this->fields;
00065         $_model = $this->_formModel;
00066         $_wide = $this->wide;
00067 
00068         echo PS::openTag( 'div', array( 'class' => 'form' . ( $_wide ? ' wide' : null ) ) );
00069 
00070         foreach ( $_fieldList as $_key => $_property )
00071         {
00072             //  Pull out div options and open
00073             $_divOptions = PS::o( $_property, 'row', array( 'class' => 'row' ), true );
00074             echo PS::openTag( 'div', $_divOptions );
00075 
00076             try
00077             {
00078                 //  Pull out label and field info
00079                 $_label = PS::o( $_property, 'label', array(), true );
00080                 $_field = PS::o( $_property, 'field', $_property, true );
00081                 $_innerModel = PS::o( $_property, 'model', null, true );
00082 
00083                 //  Field type and options should be all that are left
00084                 $_fieldType = PS::o( $_field, 'type', 'textField', true );
00085 
00086                 //  For HTML elements, just echo what's left in the array
00087                 if ( 'html' === strtolower( $_key ) )
00088                     echo PS::o( $_property, 0 );
00089                 else
00090                 {
00091                     echo $this->label( $_innerModel ? $_innerModel : $_model, $_key, $_label );
00092                     array_unshift( $_field, $_model, $_key );
00093                     echo call_user_func_array( array( $this, $_fieldType ), $_field );
00094                 }
00095             }
00096             catch ( Exception $_ex )
00097             {
00098                 CPSLog::error( __METHOD__, 'Exception while building form: ' . $_ex->getMessage() );
00099             }
00100 
00101             echo PS::closeTag( 'div' );
00102         }
00103 
00104         echo PS::closeTag( 'div' );
00105     }
00106 }
